title: The Talks "Picture This" Video
description:
The Talks "Picture This" Video

The Talks Music video for the Debut Single "Picture This" - OUT 28th JULY 2008!!

Up and coming Ska band The Talks recently decided to document their musical shenanigans with the help of Surrect media. So with a shiny new HD camera and an intimidatingly sized jib in hand we headed down to R&R studios to film the lads in action.  With cast, crew and jib assembled the five hour shoot turned out to be a massive success. A week later for the second part of the shoot the lads found themselves in more familiar surroundings, namely a pub, where friends and family of the band were cajoled into singing the track picture this... to camera.  The results are viewable via the following link. A big thanks to everyone who helped support the band (invited or not...see the end of the video!).

Co-Director/Cameraman: Graham Sparling
Co-Director/Producer: Breon Snowdon

REAL DESIGN // SURRECT MEDIA
